## Change Type

- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Bugfix
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Release / Deployment

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass locally (backend + Android build)
- [ ] No secrets/keys/credentials added
- [ ] Env separation preserved (dev/staging/prod do not share data)
- [ ] Production-impacting changes reviewed by ops/codeowners

## Notes

Describe the intent and any rollout considerations.
